cleaned_text: Image 1 of ADK Evail $34.14 Vitamin D Complex has been reformulated as ADK Evail, now available as a softgel.ADK Evail provides 5,000 IUs of vitamin D, along with clinically relevant dosages of vitamins A and K, and vitamin E isomers. The formula is designed to support balance when supplementing these fat-soluble micronutrients, which function in intricate inter-relationships with each other. High-dose supplementation of only one of the fat-soluble vitamins could lead to a relative deficiency of other fat-soluble vitamins and result in unwanted
